org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.impl

Class BatchInputSplit

  • java.lang.Object
    • InputSplit
      • org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.RangeInputSplit
        • org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.impl.BatchInputSplit
          • org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.impl.BatchInputSplit

  • public class BatchInputSplit
extends BatchInputSplit
    The Class BatchInputSplit. Encapsulates Accumulo ranges for use in Map Reduce jobs. Can contain several Ranges per InputSplit.
